title: Cultural Metacognitive Pedagogy for Intercultural Competency Development (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher foreign language proficiency and basic intercultural communication experience
context.additional_context: A practical skills-focused cultural competency enhancement program for job seekers.

learning_goals: Learners can implement at least three cultural metacognitive strategies to reflect on and adjust their thinking processes in diverse cultural contexts.
Learners can demonstrate emotional flexibility in intercultural conflict situations and propose effective response strategies with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can design and practice intercultural communication strategies based on real-world business scenarios.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
